source.sqlReaderQuery:
select p.ID_SEC_PERSON,p.TX_LOGIN,p.TX_NAME,c.ID_CUSTOMER,c.TX_CUSTOMER_NAME
from [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON] p
inner join [SB3].[SB3].[SEC_PERSON_CUSTOMER] pc on p.ID_SEC_PERSON = pc.ID_SEC_PERSON_REPORTER
inner join [SB3].[SB3].[CUSTOMER] c on c.ID_CUSTOMER = pc.ID_CUSTOMER
where p.TX_EMAIL1 LIKE 'fernando%'
and pc.ID_SEC_CONTEXT = 5;
